titleStmt.title: Wit withovt money a comedie, as it hath been presented with good applause at the private house in Drury Lane, by Her Majesties servants / written by [brace] Francis Beamount [sic] and John Flecher ...
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
